configurableProperties.name: enabled
configurableProperties.description: Enable or disable line number indicator effects.
configurableProperties.markdownDescription: Enable or disable line number indicator effects.

configurableProperties.name: activeLineAnimationDuration
configurableProperties.description: The duration of the animation that occurs when the active line number changes, in seconds.
configurableProperties.markdownDescription: The duration of the animation that occurs when the active line number changes, in **seconds**.

configurableProperties.name: activeLineOffset
configurableProperties.description: The offset of the active line number to the right, in pixels.
configurableProperties.markdownDescription: The offset of the active line number to the right, in **pixels**.

configurableProperties.name: activeLineGlowSize
configurableProperties.description: The size of the glow effect around the active line number, in pixels.
configurableProperties.markdownDescription: The size of the glow effect around the active line number, in **pixels**.

configurableProperties.name: activeLineSkewAngle
configurableProperties.description: The angle of the skew effect on the active line number's text, in degrees. Negative values allowed.
configurableProperties.markdownDescription: The angle of the skew effect on the active line number's text, in **degrees**. *Negative values allowed.*
